text:
Saw my mom Linda the other day.
Mom: you look so cute in that winter hat.
Me: thanks!
Mom, next day by phone: yesterday i told you you looked cute in that hat. I shouldn’t have said that. You actually looked like R2D2.
  Whose mom calls to revoke compliments?! Classic Linda.

text:
Yardley (our daughter): “what are you guys going to do for your anniversary?”
Doug: “we went out for a nice lunch together.”
Yardley: “how is that fun? You need to go on a roller coaster ride or something.”
Doug: “we’ve been on one!”
Word.
